sn45.96:1.2: ganga, yamuna, aciravati, sarabhu, mahi, sabba ta pacinaninna pacinapona pacinapabbhara;
sn45.96:1.3: evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ariyam atthangikam maggam bhavento ariyam atthangikam maggam bahulikaronto nibbananinno hoti nibbanapono nibbanapabbharo.
sn45.96:1.4: Kathanca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ariyam atthangikam maggam bhavento ariyam atthangikam maggam bahulikaronto nibbananinno hoti nibbanapono nibbanapabbharo?
sn45.96:1.5: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sammaditthim bhaveti vivekanissitam …pe… sammasamadhim bhaveti vivekanissitam viraganissitam nirodhanissitam vossaggaparinamim.
sn45.96:1.6: Evam kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ariyam atthangikam maggam bhavento ariyam atthangikam maggam bahulikaronto nibbananinno hoti nibbanapono nibbanapabbharo”ti.
